text:
....No, one beat too slow.
It needs to be more...

Hiori, good job.
Are you feeling alright now?

Producer... thank you.
Did something... not go well?

No, it's not that.
I just noticed you're really digging deep into this.

Well, of course.
This is our chance at a training camp.

I want to focus even more than usual and get resultsâ€”...
Otherwise, the training camp won't mean anything.

(But... being too intense isn't good either.
Alright...!)

Oh, sorry.
Thanks, Hiori, for approaching this with such positivity.

...Maybe you'll grow so much that you'll
outgrow the training camp...!

Outgrow the training camp...?
...Um, what do you mean by that?

Oh... I see.
My apologies, I thought it was a metaphor...

No, no,
it was my fault for making a teasing remark...!

(Hmm...
I wish she could relax a bit more...)
